name: Stock Search
description:
After the stock market crashed, soup stock became a precious commodity, necessary for survival. Brandishing a stockless gun, in a stockless world, you must search for soup stock through the department store, which is almost...

out of stock

Directions: Use the A and D keys to move yourself left and right, and press the left mouse button to shoot the gun. You only have ten bullets to propel yourself, so use them wisely! Press R to restart the level.

Link to Play Online: https://people.rit.edu/wno9619/out_of_stock_build/

Credits:

Music: Brian

Art: Will

Scripting: Megan, Max, Will

Thanks to Vigorousjammer on Deviantart for the supermarket background!
